name: dapp-project-template
description: A project template for your smart contract.

scripts.start: yarn server && yarn back:migrate && yarn watch
scripts.front:assets: cp LICENSE build/ && cp humans.txt build/ && cp index.html build/ && cp -r assets/ build/
scripts.front:build: yarn front:assets && tailwindcss -i css/main.css -o build/main.css && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.front:watch: yarn front:assets && tailwindcss -i css/main.css -o build/main.css --watch & webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch
